      • onActionModify

        Parameters:

      • onActionDeleteAppt

        public void onActionDeleteAppt()
        Deletes the selected appointment. Prompts user on success with ID and type. Reloads tableview. Prompts user with errors.

      • onActionAll

        public void onActionAll()
        Loads all appointments to the tableview.

      • onActionByMonth

        public void onActionByMonth()
        Filters appointments tableview to show only those with the next month. One of my lambda expressions. Month class allowed me to make an easy to read stream with lambda expression. The other option would have been to either implement something similar to the onActionByWeek method or, to use many if/else statements.

      • onActionByWeek

        public void onActionByWeek()
        Filters appointments tableview to show only those within the next week. Lambda solution most likely not the best. Both this solution and numerous if conditionals do not look clean. Not sure of performance comparison.

      • loadTable

        public void loadTable​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointments)
        Load tableview with Appointment data provided.
        Parameters:
        appointments - appointments, filtered or not, to populate the tableview

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initial method called upon screen load. Populates table view with appointment data.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
